```csharp
using Pulumi;
using Tencentcloud = TencentCloudIAC.PulumiPackage.Tencentcloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var wafProtection = new Tencentcloud.Tse.WafProtection("wafProtection", new Tencentcloud.Tse.WafProtectionArgs
        {
            GatewayId = "gateway-ed63e957",
            Lists = 
            {
                "7324a769-9d87-48ce-a904-48c3defc4abd",
            },
            Operate = "open",
            Type = "Route",
        });
    }

}
```

            title="Required">
        <span id="gateway_id_python">

            title="Required">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p><code>open</code>: open the protection, <code>close</code>: close the protection.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="type_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The type of protection resource. Reference value: <code>Global</code>: instance, <code>Service</code>: service, <code>Route</code>: route, <code>Object</code>: obejct (This interface does not currently support this type).</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="lists_python">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Sequence[str]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Means the list of services or routes when the resource type <code>Type</code> is <code>Service</code> or <code>Route</code>.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>

    </dt>
    <dd><p>Means the list of services or routes when the resource type <code>Type</code> is <code>Service</code> or <code>Route</code>.</p>

            title="Optional">

    </dt>
    <dd><p><code>open</code>: open the protection, <code>close</code>: close the protection.</p>

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>

    <dd><p>The type of protection resource. Reference value: <code>Global</code>: instance, <code>Service</code>: service, <code>Route</code>: route, <code>Object</code>: obejct (This interface does not currently support this type).</p>
